Name: 2048 Royal Cards
About the game: 2048 Royal Cards is the most fun 2048 Cards solitaire. Best classic puzzle game of 2048. 2048 Royal Cards. Sounds cool? DOWNLOAD NOW. We are sure you will enjoy a lot. HOW TO GET POINTS? • Sliding the cards from bottom. When two cards with the same number touch, they merge into one and get points. Start at 2 and reach 32, 128, 512, 1024 and finally 2048. • Collect points. Sounds easy? Play it now! 2048 ROYAL CARDS IS EASY TO GET POINTS: • Score mega points with combos • Make a 2048 royal cards • To collect bonus cards, like the UNDO Card, Wild card, Discard card • Wild card can merge with any number • Discard the card you don’t like
